meta.reasoning: Successfully completed investigation and implementation. Root cause identified: spacing mismatch between metric cards (16pt) and masonry columns (8pt) causing visual misalignment. Implemented Option 3: added subtle visual separator (1px divider with 30% opacity) between metric cards and masonry layout to clarify they are independent sections with different column alignments. Solution is clean, non-intrusive, and maintains the glassmorphism design aesthetic.
